original_title: Pasco, avanzar más allá de la muerte
overview: On March 21, 1975, Triple A kidnaps, tortures, shoots and dynamite eight popular militants in the San José de Temperley neighborhood. This traumatic event is known as the Pasco Massacre and is part of a terrifying rehearsal room that pre-announces the so-called State Terrorism.
title: Pasco, avanzar más allá de la muerte
